title: LA KINGS Online Media Font
content:
This might be an easy one for you, but it's stumping me. This font is used on the [LA Kings website (lakings.com)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132703/http:/kings.nhl.com/) and social media ( [facebook](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132703/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.facebook.com/LAKings/photos_stream), [instagram](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132703/http:/instagram.com/lakingshockey), [twitter photos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132703/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Ftwitter.com/LAKings/media)).

These are some fonts that I found to be similar in some respects, but not the right one: FF DIN, ITC Conduit, Battersea, Stratum 1, Stratum 2, Lintel, Route 66, Geogrotesque, Bourgeois, Rama Gothic, H&J Forza, Purista Web, Moire, Tstar, Helsinki, Nudista, Boxed.

Here are some images from across their social media. I tried to include symbols, numbers, some lowercase, different weights, and certain letters (K, Q, M) that seemed to trip me up with the fonts above:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/LAKINGS_mediafont_6021.jpg)

I would appreciate the help. Thanks.

Font: 

 Refrigerator Deluxe 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132703/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: KingsKnight

comments.content: If anyone knows how I can add a thumbnail I would appreciate the help. I can't seem to do that or figure out where it says on the site.
